summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ServisPro property sales and rental document features. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all new features working correctly: 2-step property sale form, 2-step rental form with documents, document display in agent dashboard (MyPropertySales, MyRentals), and admin dashboard with Ventes tab and document viewing.

seed_data_creation: Created test property sales and rentals with documents during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All property sale and rental document features are working correctly. The 2-step forms (PropertySaleForm.js, RentalListingForm.js) allow document upload in step 2. MyPropertySales.js and MyRentals.js display document status and clickable links. AdminDashboard.js has a Ventes tab showing all property sales with full document viewing capability. Document types supported: titre_foncier, seller_id_document, registration_ministere, documents_additionnels.
